cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
Want a beater for your teenage kid to tear up?  If so, this is your car.  Everything works, but it ain't pretty.

An indestructable gem.  This cherry-red pickup truck may be a veteran of the roads, but still runs like the day it was rolled off the factory line.  One owner, babied from the start, and ready to come home with you!
